content.description: Climb past 9 bolts (optional nuts or 1/2" cam) for 110'.
content.location: This route is on the left edge of the crag and is all face climbing. Belay on top at a big pine tree.

content.description: Square Hammer is a 5.8 route with a .10a crux.
content.protection: 5 bolts + 2 each of cams 1/2" to 1 1/2". The route is 95' long.
content.location:
Start right of

Send the Pain Below

. Start below a bolt on the lip of a small bulge. Climb past 3 bolts on quality rock (.8) to a bolt below a double roof. A .10a move under the 4th bolt leads to a bolt on upper roof. The big, right-facing corner is easy with a .5/.6 topout. Belay on top.

An easy descent from the top is: go left, north.

content.description: Climb up about 10' to a short, overhanging finger crack (.11c/d) that diagonals left. Face climb past 2 bolts, then traverse left around roof, and go up to bolt below upper roof. Step right under roof to bolt, then climb up an arete past 2 bolts. Finish straight up (.10) or step left and up left of arete (.9) . Belay at a pine tree on top. The route is basicly a high quality face climb of sustained .9 and .10 that has a short finger crack at the bottom.
content.protection: 8 bolts + a few cams 3/4" to 1 1/2". The route is 95' long.
content.location:
It is right of

Last Resort

.

content.description:
Just right of

Will Not Bow

is a left-facing corner. At the top of the corner, clip a bolt, step up (.8+), then traverse left, and climb past last 2 bolts of

Will Not Bow

. Belay on top.
content.protection: 3 bolts, 1 each nut to 1 1/2", 2 each of cams 1/2" to 1 1/2", and 1 each of cams 1 3/4" to 2 1/2". The route is 110' long.
content.location: It is on the left side of the crag.
